mapper.select: select member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, member_gender as memberGender, member_phone as memberPhone, member_email as memberEmail, member_grade as memberGrade, enroll_date as enrollDate from member_tbl order by member_no asc

select member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, member_gender as memberGender, member_phone as memberPhone, member_email as memberEmail, member_grade as memberGrade, enroll_date as enrollDate from member_tbl where member_id=#{searchMemberId}

select member_name as memberName, member_id as memberId, member_gender as memberGender, member_phone as memberPhone, member_email as memberEmail, member_grade as memberGrade, enroll_date as enrollDate, application_date as applicationDate from member_tbl join seller_application using(member_no) order by application_date
